Definition at line 76 of file StegLACK.h.

int StegLACK::intervalCount

Counts normal packages being sent.

Once intervalCount reaches seqFireInterval, the sequence is being send according to its structure stored in stegSeq.

Definition at line 34 of file StegLACK.h.

Pointer to remember the position in stegData.

Definition at line 56 of file StegLACK.h.

int StegLACK::queueFreeSpace

Used when simulating the incoming packets queue.

Says how much space is left in incoming packets queue.

Definition at line 66 of file StegLACK.h.

int StegLACK::seqFireInterval

The interval at which the sequence fires.

After it fires, the new seq interval is being randomly chosen according to min and max intervals from config.
